mapper.insert: insert into mll_order_item (id, item_id, goods_id, order_id, title, price, num, total_fee, pic_path, seller_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
